rows.translation: Of what do they ask one another?

bismillah.translation: In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful.

rows.translation: About the great event,
About which they differ?
Nay! they shall soon come to know
Nay! Nay! they shall soon know.
Have We not made the earth an even expanse?
And the mountains as projections (thereon)?
And We created you in pairs,
And We made your sleep to be rest (to you),
And We made the night to be a covering,
And We made the day for seeking livelihood.
And We made above you seven strong ones,
And We made a shining lamp,
And We send down from the clouds water pouring forth abundantly,
That We may bring forth thereby corn and herbs,
And gardens dense and luxuriant.
Surely the day of decision is (a day) appointed:

rows.arabic: يَوْمَ يُنفَخُ فِى ٱلصُّورِ فَتَأْتُونَ أَفْوَاجًا
rows.translation: The day on which the trumpet shall be blown so you shall come forth in hosts,
rows.transliteration: yawma yunfakhu fiṣ ṣūri fata-tūna afwājā

rows.translation: And the heaven shall be opened so that it shall be all openings,
And the mountains shall be moved off so that they shall remain a mere semblance.
Surely hell lies in wait,
A place of resort for the inordinate,
Living therein for ages.

rows.arabic: لَّا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا بَرْدًا وَلَا شَرَابًا
rows.translation: They shall not taste therein cool nor drink
rows.transliteration: lā yadhūqūna fīhā bardan walā sharābā

rows.translation: But boiling and intensely cold water,
Requital corresponding.
Surely they feared not the account,
And called Our communications a lie, giving the lie (to the truth).
And We have recorded everything in a book,
So taste! for We will not add to you aught but chastisement.
Surely for those who guard (against evil) is achievement,
Gardens and vineyards,
And voluptuous women of equal age;
And a pure cup.

rows.arabic: لَّا يَسْمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغْوًا وَلَا كِذَّٰبًا
rows.translation: They shall not hear therein any vain words nor lying.
rows.transliteration: lā yasma`ūna fīhā laghwan walā kidhhābā

rows.translation: A reward from your Lord, a gift according to a reckoning:

rows.arabic: رَّبِّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ۖ لَا يَمْلِكُونَ مِنْهُ خِطَابًا
rows.translation: The Lord of the heavens and the earth and what is between them, the Beneficent Allah, they shall not be able to address Him.
rows.transliteration: rabbis samāwāti wal-arḍi wa mā baynahumar raḥmān ۖ lā yamlikūna minhu khiṭābā

rows.arabic: يَوْمَ يَقُومُ ٱلرُّوحُ وَٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ صَفًّا ۖ لَّا يَتَكَلَّمُونَ إِلَّا مَنْ أَذِنَ لَهُ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ وَقَالَ صَوَابًا
rows.translation: The day on which the spirit and the angels shall stand in ranks; they shall not speak except he whom the Beneficent Allah permits and who speaks the right thing.
rows.transliteration: yawma yaqūmur rūḥu wal malā-ikatu ṣaffā ۖ lā yatakallamūna illā man adhina lahur raḥmānu waqāla ṣawābā

rows.arabic: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْيَوْمُ ٱلْحَقُّ ۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ مَـَٔابًا
rows.translation: That is the sure day, so whoever desires may take refuge with his Lord.
rows.transliteration: dhālikal yawmul ḥaqq ۖ faman shā-at-takhadha ilā rabbihi ma-ābā

rows.arabic: إِنَّآ أَنذَرْنَـٰكُمْ عَذَابًا قَرِيبًا يَوْمَ يَنظُرُ ٱلْمَرْءُ مَا قَدَّمَتْ يَدَاهُ وَيَقُولُ ٱلْكَافِرُ يَـٰلَيْتَنِى كُنتُ تُرَٰبًۢا
rows.translation: Surely We have warned you of a chastisement near at hand: the day when man shall see what his two hands have sent before, and the unbeliever shall say: O! would that I were dust!
rows.transliteration: innā andharnākum `adhāban qarīban yawma yanẓurul mar-u mā qaddamat yadāhu wayaqūlul kāfiru yālaytanī kuntu turābā
